property.name: portalAppName
property.label: Portal Application Name
property.description: Name for this portal application

property.name: portalAppUid
property.label: Portal Application Identifier
property.description: Unique identifier for this portal application as defined in the portlet.xml

property.name: portalAppConcreteUid
property.label: Concrete Portal Application Identifier
property.description: Required when deploying a IBM-API type portlet. Concrete Unique identifier for this portal application as defined in the portlet.xml

property.name: disableDeregisterOnUninstall
property.label: Disable deregistration on uninstall
property.description: In some usecases deregistration of portlets is not desired, especially when replacing one application with another one.

property.name: portlets
property.label: Portlets
property.description: List of portlets to register.

property.name: portletName
property.description: Name of the portlet (portlet-name) as described in the portlet.xml

property.name: uniqueName
property.description: Unique name for portlet

property.name: preferences
property.description: Portlet preferences.

property.name: clones
property.label: Clones
property.description: List of portlet clones to register.

property.name: authLevel
property.description: The String representation of the associated auth level. Only used when step-up autentication is enabled.

property.name: userAclMapping
property.description: List of User ACL mappings of this portlet. Keyed by security level. Value are the subject ids delimited by |. Valid roles are user,privileged user,contributor,editor,manager,delegator,security administrator and administrator

property.name: groupAclMapping
property.description: List of Group ACL mappings of this portlet. Keyed by security level. Value are the subject ids delimited by |. Valid roles are user,privileged user,contributor,editor,manager,delegator,security administrator and administrator

property.name: cloneName
property.description: Name of the portlet clone

property.name: uniqueName
property.description: Unique name for portlet

property.name: preferences
property.description: Portlet preferences.

property.name: defaultlocale
property.description: Default locale, needs to be in the localedata list.

property.name: localedata
property.label: localedata
property.description: Locale data, one is mandetory and specified as default.

property.name: authLevel
property.description: The String representation of the associated auth level. Only used when step-up autentication is enabled.

property.name: userAclMapping
property.description: List of User ACL mappings of this portlet. Keyed by security level. Value are the subject ids delimited by |. Valid roles are user,privileged user,contributor,editor,manager,delegator,security administrator and administrator

property.name: groupAclMapping
property.description: List of Group ACL mappings of this portlet. Keyed by security level. Value are the subject ids delimited by |. Valid roles are user,privileged user,contributor,editor,manager,delegator,security administrator and administrator

property.name: locale
property.description: locale of the name, description and keywords

property.name: title
property.description: Portlet title in specified locale

property.name: description
property.description: Portlet description in specified locale

property.name: keywords
property.description: Portlet keywords in specified locale

type.description: WAR with values configured for a deployment.

property.description: Name for this portal application

property.name: portalAppUid

property.description: Unique identifier for this portal application as defined in the portlet.xml

property.label: Concrete Portal Application Identifier

property.name: disableDeregisterOnUninstall
property.label: Disable deregistration on uninstall
property.description: In some usecases deregistration of portlets is not desired, especially when replacing one application with another one.

property.label: Portlets
property.description: List of portlets to register.

type.description: Deployed portlet to WebSphere Portal runtime.

property.name: portletName
property.description: Name of the portlet (portlet-name) as described in the portlet.xml

property.name: uniqueName
property.description: Unique name for portlet

property.name: preferences
property.description: Portlet preferences.

property.name: clones
property.label: Clones
property.description: List of portlet clones to register.

property.name: authLevel
property.description: The String representation of the associated auth level. Only used when step-up autentication is enabled.

property.name: userAclMapping
property.description: List of User ACL mappings of this portlet. Keyed by security level. Value are the subject ids delimited by |. Valid roles are user,privileged user,contributor,editor,manager,delegator,security administrator and administrator

property.name: groupAclMapping
property.description: List of Group ACL mappings of this portlet. Keyed by security level. Value are the subject ids delimited by |. Valid roles are user,privileged user,contributor,editor,manager,delegator,security administrator and administrator

type.description: Deployed portlet clone to WebSphere Portal runtime.

property.name: cloneName
property.description: Name of the portlet clone

property.name: uniqueName
property.description: Unique name for portlet

property.name: preferences
property.description: Portlet preferences.

property.name: defaultlocale
property.description: Default locale, needs to be in the localedata list.

property.name: localedata
property.label: localedata
property.description: Locale data, one is mandetory and specified as default.

property.name: authLevel
property.description: The String representation of the associated auth level. Only used when step-up autentication is enabled.

property.name: userAclMapping
property.description: List of User ACL mappings of this portlet. Keyed by security level. Value are the subject ids delimited by |. Valid roles are user,privileged user,contributor,editor,manager,delegator,security administrator and administrator

property.name: groupAclMapping
property.description: List of Group ACL mappings of this portlet. Keyed by security level. Value are the subject ids delimited by |. Valid roles are user,privileged user,contributor,editor,manager,delegator,security administrator and administrator

type.description: Locales to give the portlet clone name and description. One is always needed.

property.name: locale
property.description: locale of the name, description and keywords

property.name: title
property.description: Portlet title in specified locale

property.name: description
property.description: Portlet description in specified locale

property.name: keywords
property.description: Portlet keywords in specified locale

type.description: A resource containing inline XmlAccess scripts that are used for deployment and rollback

property.name: configUri
property.description: Uri to be appended to the wpConfigUrl defined on the container. Used when applying xmlaccess to a virtual portal

property.name: applyScript
property.description: XmlAccess to execute on deployment

property.name: unapplyScript
property.description: XmlAccess to execute on rollback. Should undo what the apply script did.

type.description: A folder containing 2 XmlAccess files that are used for deployment and rollback

property.name: configUri
property.description: Uri to be appended to the wpConfigUrl defined on the container. Used when applying xmlaccess to a virtual portal

property.name: applyScript
property.description: Name of XmlAccess file in folder to execute on deployment

property.name: unapplyScript
property.description: Name of XmlAccess file in folder to execute on rollback. Should undo what the apply file did.

property.name: portalHost
property.label: Portal Host
property.description: The host xml access is on.

property.name: wpHome
property.label: Installation location
property.description: Location of WebSphere Portal on the primary node.

property.name: wpProfileLocation
property.label: Portal Profile Home
property.description: The location of the portal profile.

property.name: wpConfigUrl
property.label: Configuration URL
property.description: The URL of the WebSphere Portal configuration API.

property.name: wpAdminUsername
property.label: Administrative user
property.description: Username of the administrative user.

property.name: wpAdminPassword
property.label: Administrative password
property.description: Password of the administrative user.

property.name: installedAppDir
property.description: The install applications directory under the profile
